channel.title: Labs on CS 220
channel.description: Recent content in Labs on CS 220

item.title: Lab 1: Git
item.description: Due: Wednesday, April 15th, 8pm NOTE: This lab is based on a Linux and Git lab originally written by Anne Rogers for CMSC 12100 (and updated and edited by a variety of instructors and TAs throughout the years) In some of your previous CS courses, you may have become familiar with using Subversion (SVN) to handle revision control (or version control) of your projects and assignments, and to submit your work for grading.
